channel.title: Few Questions, Please help me ;)
channel.description:
i got a small list of thing i need help with,
-a auto restarter. -only make 2 people per ip able to login -Help with adding items to my client+server Cuz i dont get the item i placed in the client i will get random items, and i place it between 10000-15000
Add me on msn if u can help me,
(marktplaatsds@live.nl) (basbillebloot@hotmail.com)

item.title: Few Questions, Please help me ;)
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

auto restarter code.@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title PK Jad Scape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
With Items you need to add the model into the model folder. Then put it in class8.java(both client sided) Then go into server folder edit the item.java to put it in the correct spot and item.cfg to give the weapon bonuses

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions, Please help me ;)
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Change the amount of ips you can login with. Server.java I suppose. To add models get the model and add it to the model folder. Then put the ints in class8.java and if you wanna put it in the correct spot then add the item id in item.java.

Read full topic
